title: How to Adopt a Unicorn on The Sims 3 Pets (PC)

steps.title: Find three household pets, they must be major pets (horse, unicorn, cat or dog) as minor pets ( turtle, fish, bird, lizard, snake or rodent) don't count.
steps.content: Find three household pets, they must be major pets (horse, unicorn, cat or dog) as minor pets ( turtle, fish, bird, lizard, snake or rodent) don't count.

steps.title: Unicorns appear only between 8pm and 5am only - so every night go to map view and 'spy' on both fishing lots or a science center (Cinnamon Falls and the water plant) at the same time from 8pm till 5am.
steps.content: Unicorns appear only between 8pm and 5am only - so every night go to map view and 'spy' on both fishing lots or a science center (Cinnamon Falls and the water plant) at the same time from 8pm till 5am.

steps.title: Keep doing so until a glowing dust cloud forms over a fishing lot.
steps.content: Keep doing so until a glowing dust cloud forms over a fishing lot. Underneath that is a unicorn.

steps.title: Having the relationship with your pets as high as possible, watch and socialize with it until you get the option to adopt it.
steps.content: Having the relationship with your pets as high as possible, watch and socialize with it until you get the option to adopt it. The option will be greyed out if you already have the max number of pet (the max number is 6). Click that and he/she should accept saying " You have proved to be a friend to all animals, i will follow wherever you lead."

steps.title: Click Ctrl shift C at the same time.
steps.content: Click Ctrl shift C at the same time. A box should appear at the top. Type in testingcheatsenabled true.

steps.title: Shift click on the unicorn.
steps.content: Shift click on the unicorn. You will be able to click on the unicorn to add to active family. The unicorn is now yours and can be bred from.

steps.title: Make a Sim go to the fishing lot with the horse.
steps.content: Make a Sim go to the fishing lot with the horse.

steps.title: Look around to see if there is a wild horse there too.
steps.content: Look around to see if there is a wild horse there too. If there isn't, this won't work.

steps.title: Pet the wild horse until it is not scared of you anymore.
steps.content: Pet the wild horse until it is not scared of you anymore.

steps.title: Get the wild horse and your tame horse so close together it looks like their necks are glued together.
steps.content: Get the wild horse and your tame horse so close together it looks like their necks are glued together.

steps.title: Go to the Sim's profile (the Sim that came along too).
steps.content: Go to the Sim's profile (the Sim that came along too). Click just between the two horse skins.

steps.title: Wait for a box to pop up in the right top corner of your screen.
steps.content: Wait for a box to pop up in the right top corner of your screen. It will have a dog and cat in blue on it with a writing place.

steps.title: Type in Unicorn in the box.
steps.content: Type in Unicorn in the box.

steps.title: Your "already adopted" horse should change into a "already adopted" unicorn.
steps.content: Your "already adopted" horse should change into a "already adopted" unicorn.
